Speed Shop

The Bay Area's newest Speed Shop to meet all your performance parts needs

Coming soon to serve the Bay Area

We offer only the highest quality hand-selected performance parts and accessory

Stop by and talk with our experts - we'll work with you and discuss the best approach for your project

Plus we'll show you the parts we use and give you the insider tips to install and tune them

Featured Projects

Every build is infused with our blood and sweat. Taming metal and tuning performace.

’67 Chevy Nova

Tedious work for excellent results is the mark of true craftsmen - and we push our team to do the best they can every time.

Fabbed up some finish panels from the core support to grille. It tightened everything up a little.

A little extra effort can go a long way!

Listen to our Customers

Don't take our word for it... Our great customers share their stories

  • “They did a great job of replacing my carburetor on my 1971 Monte Carlo. Very professional and detailed invoice I would highly recommend if you want your classic worked on to come here. Turn around time was fast.”

    Lisa Northcutt

  • “I came in to tune up the engine and in inspection. Car was bogging and not running well. Geoffrey replaced the carb and got the timing on point and the car was running at its best, thanks to Driven Garage. Driven Garage its just the place to to go.”

    Juan Cruz

  • “71 Chevelle: Performed a complete re-wire of the whole car, new dash and digital gauges, new retro radio, and a bunch more. I can not say enough about this team. So glad I found them. They make me feel welcome every time I stop by.”

    Jonathan Richardson

  • “This is THE place to take your older/classic car. Geoff and his crew are great!! I have been back multiple times to upgrade my 1977 Chevy Truck. They do it all from electrical, bodywork and of course working on vintage motors. Top notch quality work.”

    Eddie Valdez

  • “My 93 year old father has proudly owned a 1978 Buick Electra Limited. The lack of qualified repair shops that could service an older carbureted car lead me to a shop recommendation from Buick forum “Driven Garage”. THE go to place for all your service, repair and restoration needs.”

    Reggie Davis

  • “Driven Garage is a life saver! My car started sputtering and I had to pull over. Driven Garage was one of the few auto shops open on a Saturday! They ran diagnostics, ordered parts, and got it fixed by Monday. I'm very grateful for their work and great customer service!”

    Camila Hurtado

Recent Blog Posts

See what we're up to and follow the latest news

Driven Garage on ROADKILL Show

Geoff and Ross helped Mike Finnegan and David Frieburger build one of Mike’s dream cars right here in Oakland in our shop. We appear in Season 11, Episodes 4 and 5. We had a great time and created memories to last a lifetime. Check out episode 4 here and epiosode 5 here. Requires a subscription, but you know you want to!

Cooling Upgrades

Just need that radiator or water pump replaced / re-cored? – We can handle that and keep you cool, and looking original. If you want to overkill the issue, we’ve done some pretty trick custom installs with single and dual fans, custom shrouds and monster radiators in very tight places. We also dig custom hose routing with silicone hoses and stainless tubing.

Engine Swaps / LS conversions

From LS conversions to full on custom engine builds, we know our way around horsepower. We can help spec a great crate engine for your build – or hook you up with our local engine builder to build you something that makes BIG, reliable horsepower. Mopar, Ford, Chevy, Diesel, 6 cylinder to v8, v8 to 6, direct injected 4 cylinder, quad turbo LS, big blocks, small blocks, short blocks – it’s all good to us
